description: This file defines and initializes an AI agent named 'Agno Assist' using various components such as language models, knowledge base, storage, and vector database. It also includes a main block to load knowledge and interact with the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with model, knowledge, storage, and instructions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given query.
